title: This community is so shit
body: Yea hey can we not be assholes for a second? league of legends community? if thats even fucking possible. I stopped maining yasuo because he became broken after patch 9.3. Just had 2 fucking idiots last game flame me for maining yas, even though i dont. I main kha now and thats fucking that. Dont be such a shit head about it, I play eve top one game because hey i wanna fucking have fun and mess around, so you shittalk and flame me. FUCK OFF
